description: Factor level shows no Mn treatment applied.

Factor level shows annual Mn treatment applied, 1987-1990. Treatment shown in brackets (Mn) in 1995, as had been applied in previous years. Liquid Mn foliar fertilizer applied at fourth leaf stage (usually May/June) and before flowering (usually June/July). Amounts vary from year to year. First application only in 1990 as crop failed.
Not used as a treatment factor
